content: i learned these skills for myself, but unable to create a online business because it takes time to start making some money , and now i am unable to find job, on fiverr or any freelancing sites it need ratings to convince people to give order to me, i created accounts but not got any order for months or on social media it is very hard to find a job I can edit videos for youtube if anyone have a youtube channel,i can design posters for businessesi can be a consultant i can chat with people who have problems on your website or businessI can do data entry jobs or simple tasks excel, ppt designing / making etcso any of you interested to hire me for your work , or your friend who need a worker in any field , you can tell meplease reply what kind of work or job you want to hire a worker.i am a perfectionist kind of person so don't worry about quality of the work all payments are done with crypto .please don't hire if work is scamming people

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Moved this thread to the services board, and it looks like you should include some past work.?board=52.0While looking for the first customers on this forum, you can try your luck in some of the contests that are currently taking place with "bitcoin" prizes (some match your skills).1. comments.author: Husires
comments.body: I hope you will find a job, but emotional speech will not bring a job, but rather the way you show your profile. Try as much as possible to accurately display all the skills that you can do or the previous experiences and certificates that you have.You can work in signature campaigns, but they require at least Full member rank, or you can participate in bounty campaigns that require you to have many followers on social media.
